attributes.action: Give  the People  of  Lowestoft Our Third BRIDGE promised OVER THIRTY YEARS AGO
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned are asking the Prime Minister to give the go ahead for our Third Bridge that was Promised over 30 Years ago.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
